statements.update: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM RBAC.Button WHERE Id=#Id#) UPDATE RBAC.Button SET Name=#Name#, Title=#Title#, Image=#Image#, Code=#Code#, Sort=#Sort#, Category=#Category#, Remark=#Remark#, ModifyUserId=#ModifyUserId#, ModifyDateTime=GETDATE() WHERE Id=#Id# ELSE INSERT INTO RBAC.Button ( Id, Name, Title, Image, Code, Sort, Category, Remark, Status, CreateUserId, CreateDateTime ) VALUES ( NEWID(), #Name#, #Title#, #Image#, #Code#, #Sort#, #Category#, #Remark#, 1, #CreateUserId#, GETDATE() )
statements.select: SELECT a.Id ,a.Name ,a.Title ,a.Image ,a.Code ,a.Sort ,a.Category ,a.Remark ,a.CreateUserId ,u1.Name AS CreateUserName ,a.CreateDateTime ,a.ModifyUserId ,u2.Name AS ModifyUserName ,a.ModifyDateTime FROM RBAC.Button a LEFT JOIN RBAC.[User] u1 ON a.CreateUserId=u1.Id LEFT JOIN RBAC.[User] u2 ON a.ModifyUserId=u2.Id WHERE a.Id=#value#

SELECT a.Id ,a.Name ,a.Title ,a.Image ,a.Code ,a.Sort ,a.Category ,a.Remark ,a.CreateUserId ,u1.Name AS CreateUserName ,a.CreateDateTime ,a.ModifyUserId ,u2.Name AS ModifyUserName ,a.ModifyDateTime FROM RBAC.BUTTON a LEFT JOIN RBAC.[User] u1 ON a.CreateUserId=u1.Id LEFT JOIN RBAC.[User] u2 ON a.ModifyUserId=u2.Id WHERE a.Status=1 ORDER BY SORT ASC

WITH cte AS( SELECT b.Id, a.Sort FROM rbac.SystemMenu a INNER JOIN RBAC.Button b ON a.Name=b.Name WHERE ParentId=#value# AND a.Category=3 ) SELECT a.*, CASE WHEN p.Id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END IsAllotToSystemMenu, p.Sort FROM RBAC.Button a OUTER APPLY( SELECT * FROM cte WHERE a.Id=cte.Id ) p ORDER BY CASE WHEN p.Id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END DESC, p.Sort ASC,a.Sort ASC
